_header: This lion the young in holy writ I-cleped is
_description: Life of Pope Leo II, in one MS of the South English Legendary

Bod779.First Lines:
Þis lyon þe ȝonge In holywrit I cleped isIn rome he
                    was pope ic ot to soþe I wis…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…Ihesu crist in heuene vs graunte þedir to goto þe
                    blis of paradis þat lastiþ euer mo
Bod779.Attributed Title:
Seint lion [‘þe pope’ (blacked out)] þe
                    ȝonge
Bod779.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Des Ms. Bodl. 779 jüngere Zusatzlegenden zur südlichen
                Legendensammlung.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         82 (1889): 307-422: 381-2.
